alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 9:01PM CDT until March 13 at 11:48PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Missouri... Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo. .The Ohio River will continue a slow fall, with levels at Olmsted and Cairo going below flood stage Monday afternoon into early Tuesday. For the Ohio River...including Olmsted Lock and Dam and Cairo... Minor flooding is forecast. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Olmsted Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until late Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 38.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Monday afternoon and continue falling to 24.2 feet Tuesday, March 21. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. &&
